cat: A small furry animal that says meow and loves to nap
dog: A friendly animal that says woof and loves to play fetch
elephant: A very big gray animal with a long trunk and big ears
lion: A big cat with a fluffy mane who is king of the jungle
tiger: An orange cat with black stripes who lives in the forest
bear: A big furry animal that loves honey and sleeps all winter
panda: A black and white bear that eats bamboo
rabbit: A soft fluffy animal with long ears that hops around
frog: A green animal that says ribbit and jumps in ponds
fish: An animal that swims in water and breathes through gills
bird: An animal with wings and feathers that can fly
butterfly: A pretty insect with colorful wings
bee: A buzzy insect that makes honey and helps flowers grow
turtle: An animal with a hard shell on its back that moves slowly
dinosaur: A very big animal that lived long long ago
unicorn: A magical horse with a horn on its head
dragon: A magical creature that can breathe fire
sun: The big bright ball in the sky that gives us light and warmth
moon: The round light we see in the night sky
star: A tiny sparkly light in the night sky very far away
rainbow: Colorful stripes in the sky that appear after rain
cloud: White fluffy shapes in the sky made of tiny water drops
rain: Water drops that fall from clouds
snow: Soft white ice that falls from the sky when it's cold
tree: A tall plant with a trunk, branches, and leaves
flower: A pretty plant with colorful petals
ocean: A very big area of salty water where fish and whales live
mountain: A very tall hill made of rock
forest: A place with lots and lots of trees
happy: Feeling good and joyful inside, like when you smile
sad: Feeling down or unhappy, like when you want to cry
love: A warm feeling when you care about someone very much
angry: A hot feeling when something makes you upset
scared: A shaky feeling when something frightens you
brave: Being strong even when you feel scared
kind: Being nice and helpful to others
friend: Someone you like to play with and share things with
apple: A round red or green fruit that grows on trees
banana: A yellow fruit that you peel before eating
orange: A round orange fruit full of juice
pizza: A flat round food with cheese and toppings
cake: A sweet treat often served at birthday parties
cookie: A small flat sweet treat that's yummy to eat
ball: A round toy you can throw, kick, or bounce
book: Pages with words and pictures you can read
music: Pretty sounds that make you want to dance or sing
art: Pictures and drawings you make with colors
plus: A math word that means adding things together
minus: A math word that means taking things away
times: A math word that means groups of the same number
equals: A math word that shows what the answer is
